issue_title: [Bug] Todo.from_dict accepts negative id values without validation
approach: Add validation in Todo.from_dict to reject negative id values with clear error message

source_files.description: Added validation check: if todo_id < 0 raise ValueError with message indicating 'id' must be non-negative

test_files.description: Added 3 regression tests: reject negative integer id, reject negative string id, accept zero id
